customCards:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
customCards:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

customCards:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
customCards:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
customCards:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

customCards:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
customCards:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

customCards:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
customCards:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !customCards:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

customCards:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
customCards:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !customCards:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

customCards:WhyAreWeStillHere.NAME: Why are we still here?
customCards:WhyAreWeStillHere.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Discard 4 cards at random

customCards:Blob.NAME: Blob
customCards:Blob.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to everyone and apply 2 Vulnerable, 2 Poison and 2 Weakened

customCards:Balanced.NAME: Balanced
customCards:Balanced.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to everyone including yourself

customCards:FeatureRequest.NAME: Feature Request
customCards:FeatureRequest.DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards and deal double damage next turn

customCards:LowPolygon.NAME: Compiling Shaders
customCards:LowPolygon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Skip enemy turn. NL Ends your turn

customCards:TheCouncil.NAME: The Council
customCards:TheCouncil.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 1 card. NL Gain 1 Dexterity for every card played.
customCards:TheCouncil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 2 cards. NL Gain 1 Dexterity for every card played.

customCards:PatienceHasLimits.NAME: Patience has limits
customCards:PatienceHasLimits.DESCRIPTION: If 15 or more turns have passed, kill all enemies NL (1% chance to backfire)

customCards:TheProtagonist.NAME: The Protagonist(?)
customCards:TheProtagonist.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal to 30 % of max HP
customCards:TheProtagonist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal to 50 % of max HP

customCards:TelephoneService.NAME: Telephone Service
customCards:TelephoneService.DESCRIPTION: Take up the phone, I know you're there NL Exhaust

customCards:DistortedReality.NAME: Distorted Reality
customCards:DistortedReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Skip 2 work days
